author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Department of Biochemistry of Periyar University organised a workshop on ‘RAPD and PCR techniques’ for two days recently.

The workshop was inaugurated by C. Swaminathan, Vice Chancellor of the university.

He spoke on the importance of the applications of the techniques in many areas of biology such as genetic testing, genetic finger printing, DNA sequencing and DNA cloning. L. Sudha, Director, Aristogene Biosciences, Bengaluru, delivered the special address. She said that the workshop will provide researchers a hands-on training in molecular marker techniques and highlighted the importance of this technique in Biochemistry and Biotechnology research.

The Convener of the workshop G. Sudha, Associate Professor and Head in-charge,, Department of Biochemistry, Periyar University, offered felicitations.
title: Workshop held
